IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WE ARE AN ACCREDITED STATE CHAPTER OF THE NATIONAL CHILDREN'S ALLIANCE. AS THE STATEWIDE LEADER IN THE FIGHT AGAINST CHILD ABUSE, WE CONNECT LOCAL CACS AND PARTNERS WITH TOOLS, RESOURCES, AND SUPPORT NEEDED TO PROVIDE A COMPREHENSIVE RESPONSE TO THE CHILDREN AND SUPPORTIVE CAREGIVERS IMPACTED BY ABUSE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WE ARE AN ACCREDITED STATE CHAPTER OF THE NATIONAL CHILDREN'S ALLIANCE. AS THE STATEWIDE LEADER IN THE FIGHT AGAINST CHILD ABUSE, WE CONNECT LOCAL CACS AND PARTNERS WITH TOOLS, RESOURCES, AND SUPPORT NEEDED TO PROVIDE A COMPREHENSIVE RESPONSE TO THE CHILDREN AND SUPPORTIVE CAREGIVERS IMPACTED BY ABUSE.
IRS990.Desc: TO PROVIDE LEADERSHIP AND SUPPORT TO NORTH CAROLINA'S CHILDREN'S ADVOCACY CENTERS AND MULTI-DISCIPLINARY TEAMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: TO PROVIDE PUBLIC EDUCATION, TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE, TRAINING AND SUPPORT FOR CHILDREN'S ADVOCACY CENTERS IN NORTH CAROLINA THROUGH SEMINARS AND WRITTEN MATERIALS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL GRANTS ARE PASS-THROUGH AWARDS. CACNC DETERMINES WHICH CENTERS ARE IN GOOD STANDING; AND, THEREFORE, ARE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE SUB-AWARDS. EACH CENTER AWARDED A GRANT MUST SUBMIT A REIMBURSEMENT REPORT, INCLUDING RECEIPTS, PROOF OF PAYMENT, OUTCOME DATA, AND STATISTICAL DATA. CACNC COMPLETES RANDOM SITE REVIEWS AND DESK AUDITS ANNUALLY TO CONFIRM ADHERENCE TO GRANTOR FISCAL AND DOCUMENTATION REQUIREMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS NO COMMITTEE THAT HAS AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WILL EMAIL A COMPLETE COPY OF THE FORM 990 TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS PRIOR TO FILING FOR REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER HAS SIGNED A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND IF APPLICABLE, A DISCLOSURE DETAILING THE CONFLICT OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT. THE POLICY IS DISCUSSED ANNUALLY AT A BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD DISCUSSES SALARIES AND RAISES ANNUALLY, AND APPROVES SALARIES FOR ALL EMPLOYEES. EACH EMPLOYEE'S PAY IS DOCUMENTED IN THE PERSONNEL FILE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
